attributes.action: CUT MOTOR BIKE DEATHS BY ENFORCING THE LAWS ON POOR RIDING
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned wish that more LAW ENFORCEMENT should be carried on the VERY POOR and DANGEROUS riding by many, the issues the car driver has is that they think they are a LAW ONTO THEMSELVES all the training has gone out the window from the HIGHWAY CODE and this causes the many deaths on our roads today, they take no notice of ROAD MARKINGS, UNDERTAKE, ZIG IN AND OUT of traffic, ride in the MIDDLE of the roads where ALL traffic are required to keep to the left, just one misjudgement and DEATH or SERIOUS INJURY at a lot of cost to EMERGENCY SERVICES.

USE A BIT OF BRAIN POWER AND NOT THE BIKES.
